item.description:
Sunday November 21, Steppin classes.
Structured consistent classes will be held every 6 to 8 weeks.
Master Instructor Sarah Teagle will provide a strong curriculum to further enhance and develop skills acquired and has committed to taking TOSOB to the next level.

http://www.youtube.co...

(TBA)

Cost $30 to participate

$10 will be applied toward airfare
$20 Instructor fee

In order to address the needs of Steppers at various levels classes will be small



Level l 1 pm to 3pm Steppers 1 - 2 years plus




If a Stepper elects to take both classes and there is a slot available cost is $60 ($40 instructor fee, $20 airfare)

Criteria:
It is expected participants remain consistent and practice what they learn in class on Thursday's practice sessions and help each other out with what was covered in class.



This is not a workshop
Basic members will still learn their basic from the instructors who are certified to teach the basics (CSI) and learned techniques to get beginners Steppinâ€™ with correct form and to recognize problem areas and provide troubleshooting.





Finances:
$10 due now to pay airline expense if any excess monies is collected it will be applied towards hotel
You will not be considered confirmed for class until $10 is paid
$20 is due prior to Novenber 20 Instructor Fee

Commitment:
Total expense for this class $30 and this fee will reoccur every 6 to 8 weeks
You may pay $10 weekly but initial deposit of $10 is required in advance in order to secure best airline rate.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Sunday Nov 21 Class Level l 1 to 3 p.m.
